subject: Compatible
description_text:
Yes,. I just bought these pedals and SOLD my previous set, and now, I can't
get them to work with F1 25... PLEASE tell me that they work.  Yes I sent a
very upset email before and I do apologize for that, but, this has me very
concerned.  Please respond ASAP.

Pro X Ultra pedals

conversations.body_text: Hi Corey Mason,     Hello, here is the setup guide for using the SIMSONN Plus X pedals in F1 25:  First time entering the game  You may see a message:  NO PRESET CONTROL SCHEME FOR DEVICE(S)  SIMSONN Plus X  Please customise your controls in the Settings Menu...  Click Okay to continue.  Bind controls and save a new scheme  Go to Settings → Controls to bind pedals and buttons.  When exiting, select Save as new Control Scheme, give it a name (e.g., SIMSONN), and click Save.  Manage and switch control schemes  Main Menu → Settings → Controls → Control Scheme List  Your SIMSONN scheme will appear; you can select it directly for future use.  ? Note: If you delete the scheme without backup, you will need to repeat the binding and saving process.  After completing these steps, your pedals will work properly in the game, providing a realistic driving experience.
